scan_script_only_check.description: A Scheduled Job should always be run as a technical user. A technical user must follow the naming and configuration convention as defined in the whitepaper.
scan_script_only_check.name: DataSanity - Scheduled Jobs run by technical users
scan_script_only_check.resolution_details: Change the run_as user of the identified Scheduled Jobs to a technical user. It may be considered to turn the default "System Administrator" user into a technical user as the user is associated with the majority of OOTB Scheduled Jobs.
scan_script_only_check.short_description: Scheduled Jobs should be run as technical users
scan_script_only_check.sys_name: DataSanity - Scheduled Jobs run by technical users
